    EncryptedStats
    pushRecalculateAndEncrypt(@NotNull @Valid PlainInt i)
    Adds input integer into the running metrics and returns new running average and running standard deviation in Encrypted form The calculations are done using Welford's online algorithm.

      public ServerResource(StatsSvc statsSvc, EncryptionSvc encSvc, String currentKeyID)

  • Method Details

    • pushAndRecalculate

      @POST @Path("/push-and-recalculate") @Consumes("application/json") @Produces("application/json") public PlainStats pushAndRecalculate(@NotNull @Valid @NotNull @Valid PlainInt i)
      Adds input integer into the running metrics and returns new running average and running standard deviation. The calculations are done using Welford's online algorithm. Individual numbers are not saved.
      Parameters:
      i - any 32 bit integer
      Returns:
      Stats (running average and running standard deviation) in plain

    • pushRecalculateAndEncrypt

      @POST @Path("/push-and-recalculate-encrypt") @Consumes("application/json") @Produces("application/json") public EncryptedStats pushRecalculateAndEncrypt(@NotNull @Valid @NotNull @Valid PlainInt i)
      Adds input integer into the running metrics and returns new running average and running standard deviation in Encrypted form The calculations are done using Welford's online algorithm. Individual numbers are not saved.
      Parameters:
      i - PlainInt wrapper of any 32 bit integer
      Returns:
      EncryptedStats containing EncryptedFloat values of running average and running standard deviation. KeyId identifying the key used for encryption is also part of the returned data.

    • Decrypt

      @POST @Path("/decrypt") @Consumes("application/json") @Produces("application/json") public PlainFloat Decrypt(@NotNull @Valid @NotNull @Valid EncryptedFloat s)
      Decrypts cipherTxt value in EncryptedFloat value using the key defined by keyId.
      Parameters:
      s - EncryptedFloat Containing ciphertext and keyId with which the encryption was performed.
      Returns:
      PlainFloat representing Plain value of the encrypted float value.
